Model: Redmi Note 5 Pro (Rose Gold, 6GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
comment: It’s mentioned that there is FREE: Headphone + Noosy Pin + 2 pin 3.5mm Audio Jack + OTG + 3.5mm Speed Cable. But other than Noosy PIN, there was no Headphones or OTG Cable.

Model: Redmi Note 5 Pro (Rose Gold, 6GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
comment: The volume key has stuck inside the phone, and unable to use it. Its Kind of Bend. I have checked on internet and saw so many similar cases. It has to rectify while manufacturing itself. I have raised case replacement but the process is like painful. Technician will take 5 to 7 working days to visit you to see the issue, once he sends the report to seller then they will proceed for replacement. The whole process takes 20 days approx or even more it seems. Mean while I booked this via No cost EMI offer, Now that also getting affected like once you raise replacement case, the Initial contact with back will be terminated and  for that bank will charge some money it seems. And again new contract will be made for new order or replacement. Even though issue was from seller, customer also need to suffer. Its very Bad!!

Model: Redmi Note 5 Pro (Rose Gold, 6GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
comment: Accessories that were promised were not delivered. The parcel contains only the phone, the charger and the sim ejector pin.
